meanings.definition: Suitable for use in an oven without being damaged.
meanings.sent1: This dish is ovenproof, so you can bake it without any worries.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use only ovenproof cookware when baking.
meanings.sent3: The ovenproof pan laughed at the heat, staying cool and collected.
meanings.sent4: Her resolve was as ovenproof as the metal tray in the oven.
meanings.sent5: The ovenproof label on the bakeware was a guarantee of its durability.

meanings.definition: Capable of withstanding high temperatures in an oven.
meanings.sent1: The ovenproof gloves protected his hands from the scorching heat.
meanings.sent2: An ovenproof glass dish is essential for baking at high temperatures.
meanings.sent3: The ovenproof thermometer blushed when it realized how hot it could get.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as ovenproof as the metal rack in the oven.
meanings.sent5: The ovenproof material of the apron shielded her from the fiery oven.
